0.text:
Upon entering Subiaco Antiques and Fine Jewellery
you will soon discover an amazing shopping

6.text:
experience.
Whether you are looking for an individual

9.text:
engagement ring
or a piece of jewellery to mark a special

12.text:
occasion, with their boutique range of items
covering the last 150 years of fashions and

17.text:
styles you'll surely find a unique piece to
treasure for a life time.

21.text:
From the Victorian age and Art Deco through
to Retro and Contemporary periods, Subiaco

27.text:
Antiques has one of Perth Largest selections
of period diamond, pearl and precious gemstone

33.text:
Personal Service is something Subiaco Antiques
and Fine Jewellery prides itself on, you will

38.text:
be assured of receiving a warm greeting and
friendly old fashioned service by owners Eddie

45.text:
Emma and Eddie are both qualified Gemologists
with Eddie being a registered valuer and diamond

50.text:
grader with over 20 years experience, While
Emma, a second generation Antique dealer draws

56.text:
from her background in design to seek out
pieces that bring a sense of luxury and sophistication

61.text:
to a modern world.
Ultimately, what sets Subiaco Antiques and

66.text:
fine Jewellery apart from your modern store
is that every item is unique and has a story

72.text:
Every piece is handpicked by Eddie and Emma
during their colorful buying trips locally

76.text:
and abroad. Bringing home treasures that might
have a little bit of history, a certain charm

82.text:
and something indescribable that will give
the owner a sense of individuality and pride.

87.text:
As Eddie says, We are inspired by what we
find on our travels, So travel into Subiaco

92.text:
Antiques and Fine Jewellery today and pick
up an item that’ll take you on a journey.
